getPossibleAssetDetails.description: Return the asset detail keys that can be returned by this service.

getPossibleAssetTypes.description: Return the asset types this service returns.

getStations.description: Get a set of Stations based on parameters provided

params.name: station_ids
params.description: Ids of stations to return.  Required if bounding box not provided.

params.name: bounding_box
params.description: A polygon that is the south, west, north, east of information to return. Required if no station ids provided.

params.name: company_ids
params.description: Company ids from the foreign companies.

params.name: details
params.description: Whether to fetch station asset details with the query.

getAssets.description: Get a set of Assets based on parameters provided

params.name: details
params.description: Whether to fetch station asset details with the query.
